import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Timer(_ref){let{onFocusComplete}=_ref;const[time,setTime]=useState(1500);// 25 minutes in seconds
const[isRunning,setIsRunning]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{if(isRunning){const interval=setInterval(()=>{setTime(prevTime=>{if(prevTime===1){setIsRunning(false);onFocusComplete();return 0;}return prevTime-1;});},1000);return()=>clearInterval(interval);}},[isRunning,onFocusComplete]);const toggleTimer=()=>{setIsRunning(!isRunning);};const resetTimer=()=>{setIsRunning(false);setTime(1500);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"timer text-center p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl mb-4",children:"Focus Timer"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-4xl font-mono my-4",children:[Math.floor(time/60),":",String(time%60).padStart(2,'0')]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"py-2 px-4 rounded ".concat(isRunning?'bg-red-500':'bg-green-500'," text-white"),onClick:toggleTimer,children:isRunning?'Pause':'Start'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"py-2 px-4 rounded bg-gray-500 text-white ml-4",onClick:resetTimer,children:"Reset"})]});}export default Timer;
